projects.name: Youtube Analysis - AWS
projects.desc: Youtube Analysis: securely manages, streamlines, and performs analysis on the structured and semi-structured YouTube videos data based on the video categories and the trending metrics

projects.name: Event Finder
projects.desc: Our event finder app helps users to find events happening in their area or in a specific location of interest. These events include concerts, festivals, sports games and more.

projects.name: Reddit Data Pipeline
projects.desc: This project provides a comprehensive data pipeline solution to extract, transform, and load (ETL) Reddit data into a Redshift data warehouse.

projects.name: Diabetic Retinopathy Detection
projects.desc: This project utilizes Apache Spark, hosted on an AWS distributed Hadoop cluster, to detect diabetic retinopathy in eye images.

projects.name: Therapeutic Music Player
projects.desc: This project integrates facial emotion recognition with a music player to create an emotion-aware music experience.

projects.name: Cloud Service Access Management System
projects.desc: A management system built with FastAPI and SQLAlchemy, designed to handle user subscriptions, permissions, and API usage tracking.
